name: (A)woken
storyline: The theme of the game is being inside of a computer simulation. Both the characters and enemies are programs fighting against each other.
summary:
Alpha prototype of a mecha first person shooter made in godot.
It features hand drawn anime style character sprites, an endless arcade mode and a single player story mode.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Playtesting for the 1.0 Alpha build of (a)woken for the /agdg/ Demo Day 57
